title: OceaniaSmashing Pumpkins use Premiere 1.5 BETA to debut "Oceania"
description: Premiere 1.5 Smashing Pumpkins are using a BETA of the next version of Premiere to debut their new record “Oceania.” Here’s what’s new about the app.

title: Search and Replace in multiple files with Vim
description:
I recently learned a nice VimTrick™ when pairing with Arjan. We upgrade an app to Rails 3.2.6 and got the following deprecation message:
DEPRECATION WARNING: :confirm option is deprecated and will be removed from Rails 4.0. Use ':data => { :confirm => 'Text' }' instead. Well, nothing difficult about that, but we have quite a few :confirm in this app.
Firstly we checked where we used them (note we use ruby 1.
